bothack.bot

Class ActionsComplex

  • java.lang.Object
    • bothack.bot.ActionsComplex

  • public final class ActionsComplex
extends java.lang.Object
    Factories for "smarter" actions with precondition checks and more complex behaviors.
    See Also:
    Actions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActionsComplex()

      Remove levitation item or Descend.

      Kick in the given direction if the player is capable of kicking and there don't seem to be heavy objects.
      static IAction MakeUse(IGame game, java.lang.Character slot)
      If it is possible for the player, use the item at slot in the usual way: This means wearing armor (removing any blocking armor) or putting on jewelry.

      Pray if it is likely to succeed, otherwise returns null.

      Action modifier – if the player is levitating, replaces the given action with removal of the levitation item, otherwise returns the action unmodified.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionsComplex

        public ActionsComplex()

    • Method Detail

      • Pray

        public static IAction Pray(IGame game)
        Pray if it is likely to succeed, otherwise returns null.
        See Also:
        IGame.canPray()

      • Kick

        public static IAction Kick(IGame game,
           Direction dir)
        Kick in the given direction if the player is capable of kicking and there don't seem to be heavy objects. Auto-removes levitation items, if the player has hurt legs does Search instead, if trapped moves out of the trap.

      • Unbag

        public static IAction Unbag(IGame game,
            java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Character,IItem> item)
        If the slot of the item MapEntry is a bag, take one of item out of the bag, otherwise returns null. Meant for use with entries returned by IGame#have or IGame#haveAll with the BAGGED option

      • Wield

        public static IAction Wield(IGame game,
            java.lang.Character slot)
        If it is possible for the player, wield item at slot as a weapon, otherwise returns null. Removes any shield if the weapon is two-handed.

      • MakeUse

        public static IAction MakeUse(IGame game,
              java.lang.Character slot)
        If it is possible for the player, use the item at slot in the usual way: This means wearing armor (removing any blocking armor) or putting on jewelry.

      • RemoveUse

        public static IAction RemoveUse(IGame game,
                java.lang.Character slot)
        If it is possible for the player, stop using the item at slot. This means removing armor (with blockers), unwielding a weapon or removing jewelry or accessories.

      • EnhanceAll

        public static IAction EnhanceAll(IGame game)
        Enhance any skill that can be enhanced or return null.

      • Descend

        public static IAction Descend(IGame game)
        Remove levitation item or Descend. Returns null if levitation cannot be removed.

      • UntrapMove

        public static IAction UntrapMove(IGame game)
        Move in any direction to escape a trap.

      • WithoutLevitation

        public static IAction WithoutLevitation(IGame game,
                        IAction action)
        Action modifier – if the player is levitating, replaces the given action with removal of the levitation item, otherwise returns the action unmodified. If removal of levitation is not possible, returns null. If the action is null, returns null. Doesn't handle intrinsic levitation (eg. from a potion)
        See Also:
        IGame.haveLevitationItemOn()

      • WithReason

        public static IAction WithReason(IAction action,
                 java.lang.String reason)
        Action modifier – attach a human-understandable reason to the given action. This will be seen in the logs when the action is triggered and may help with debugging. If the action is null, returns null. Reasons are stacked, all reasons will be logged when used repeatedly.
        Parameters:
        reason - Human readable text that will be logged when the action triggers
